actions.in_committee: House Committee on Education and the Workforce
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Select Education.

official_title: To amend the Older Americans Act of 1965 to facilitate interaction between students and older individuals with limited English proficiency.

summary.text: Amends the Older Americans Act of 1965 to include among supportive services that the Assistant Secretary of Labor may fund through grants for state and community programs on aging, services to encourage and facilitate regular interaction between students and older individuals, including services to older individuals with limited English proficiency.

titles.title: To amend the Older Americans Act of 1965 to facilitate interaction between students and older individuals with limited English proficiency.
